summary:
About Us - Once upon a time, in an era when humans began to realize their true power lay in their brains, great talents were celebrated like rock stars. And guess what? I was one of those divine rock stars, gifted by the gods themselves. Fast forward to today, and it's like a circus out here. Too much noise, too many distractions, and truth? It's hiding somewhere, probably playing hide and seek. Justice? Oh, it's doing a great job losing followers among the brainwashed masses. But then, I felt the itch. An itch to shake things up, to break through the noise and nonsense. It was time to wake people up and show them what true justice looks like—with a dash of flair and a whole lot of sass.

  -
